content.en: This room teaches you how to describe objects and places using there is and there are. These patterns help you talk about your room, your house, your workplace, and anything around you. Speak slowly and keep sentences short. Clear beginning and ending sounds make these structures easy to understand.
content.vi: Phòng này dạy bạn diễn tả đồ vật và không gian bằng cấu trúc there is và there are. Mẫu câu này giúp bạn nói về phòng của bạn, ngôi nhà, nơi làm việc và mọi thứ xung quanh. Hãy nói chậm và giữ câu ngắn. Âm đầu và âm cuối rõ ràng giúp người nghe hiểu dễ hơn.

copy.en:
Practice these lines.
There is a book.
There is a chair.
There is a window.
There is a problem.
Say each line slowly.
Focus on clear beginning sounds.
copy.vi: Luyện các câu sau: There is a book, There is a chair, There is a window, There is a problem. Đọc chậm và chú ý âm đầu rõ ràng.

copy.en:
Practice plural forms.
There are two books.
There are many people.
There are some chairs.
There are apples.
Say everything clearly.
Do not rush.
copy.vi: Luyện dạng số nhiều: There are two books, There are many people, There are some chairs, There are apples. Đọc rõ ràng. Đừng vội.

copy.en:
Describe your room.
There is a bed.
There is a desk.
There are books.
There are clothes on the chair.
Short, simple lines build confidence.
copy.vi: Hãy miêu tả phòng của bạn: There is a bed, There is a desk, There are books, There are clothes on the chair. Câu ngắn và đơn giản giúp bạn tự tin hơn.

copy.en:
Practice describing places.
There is a bank.
There is a park.
There are shops.
There are people.
Speak slowly and clearly.
copy.vi: Luyện miêu tả địa điểm: There is a bank, There is a park, There are shops, There are people. Nói chậm và rõ ràng.

copy.en:
Read these useful lines.
There is a problem.
There is a message for you.
There are many options.
There are people waiting.
Say each line calmly.
copy.vi: Hãy đọc các câu hữu ích sau: There is a problem, There is a message for you, There are many options, There are people waiting. Nói từng câu bình tĩnh.

copy.en:
Repeat this short drill.
There is a book.
There are books.
There is a room.
There are rooms.
Small practice builds strong understanding.
copy.vi: Luyện đoạn sau: There is a book, There are books, There is a room, There are rooms. Luyện tập nhỏ nhưng đều giúp hiểu chắc hơn.
